--create external file format
DROP EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT CsvFormat

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT CsvFormat
    WITH (
        FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
        FORMAT_OPTIONS(
            FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
            STRING_DELIMITER = '"',
            FIRST_ROW = 2
        )
    )

--create external table
DROP EXTERNAL TABLE wifi_locations;

    CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.wifi_locations (
        station varchar(50),
        station_complex varchar(50),
        lines varchar(10),
        is_historical varchar(10),
        borough varchar(10),
        county varchar(15),
        latitude decimal(8,6),
        longitude decimal(9,6),
        wifi_available varchar(50),
        att varchar(10),
        sprint varchar(10),
        tmobile varchar(10),
        verizon varchar(10),
        location varchar(50),
        georeference varchar(100)
    )
WITH (
    DATA_SOURCE = files,
    LOCATION = '/wifi_locations/*.csv',
    FILE_FORMAT = CsvFormat
);

SELECT * FROM wifi_locations;
